main.db

Class MusicPlayerDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.db.MusicPlayerDatabase

  • public class MusicPlayerDatabase
extends java.lang.Object
    MusicPlayerDatabase handles all the database related functions.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      MusicPlayerDatabase()

    • Constructor Detail

      • MusicPlayerDatabase

        public MusicPlayerDatabase()

    • Method Detail

      • removeSongFromPlaylist

        public void removeSongFromPlaylist(Playlist playlist,
                                   java.util.ArrayList<Playlist> playlists,
                                   int selectedSong)
        This method removes a song selected in the table, from the current playlist. The song is removed from the SONGS_IN_PLAYLIST table. If that 'playlist' is the song library, the song is also removed from the SONGS table.
        Parameters:
        playlist - This is the current playlist.
        playlists - This is all the existing playlists.
        selectedSong - This is the index for the selected song.

      • removePlaylist

        public void removePlaylist(int playlistID)
        This method removes a playlist from the existing playlists. The playlist is removed from the PLAYLIST table based on the playlist id.
        Parameters:
        playlistID - The id if the playlist to be removed

      • addPlaylist

        public Playlist addPlaylist(java.lang.String name,
                            java.lang.String desc,
                            java.util.ArrayList<Playlist> playlists)
        This method adds a playlist to PLAYLISTS table and creates a new playlist in the list of playlists.
        Parameters:
        name - The user chosen name of the playlist.
        desc - The description of the playlist, optional (can be empty)
        playlists - The list of all existing playlists
        Returns:
        Playlist playlist

      • addSongToLibrary

        public void addSongToLibrary(java.lang.String title,
                             java.lang.String artist,
                             java.lang.String songPath)
        This method adds a song to the library. The user selects a song on with JFileChooser. The song is added to the SONGS table and also to the PLAYLIST_SONGS tables, so that it can be viewed in the song library 'playlist'.
        Parameters:
        title - The song title, chosen as the file name
        artist - The artist the user input, optional currently
        songPath - Path on disk of the file

      • initPlaylists

        public void initPlaylists(java.util.ArrayList<Playlist> playlists)
        This function is run when the application starts. It gets the playlists from the database and adds the songs to each playlist, accoring to the information on the database.
        Parameters:
        playlists - The playlists list is passed so that the playlists can be added to the list

      • updateTable

        public void updateTable(Playlist currentPlaylist)
        This method executes when the table needs to update, when songs are removed or added.
        Parameters:
        currentPlaylist - The current playlist where the change has occurred
